name: Academy of Magic - Lair of the Beast
name_original: Academy of Magic - Lair of the Beast
description:
Magical adventurous match-3 game! After discovering his heritage as a wizard and banishing the dark power that held the once-beautiful Academy of Magic under a curse, Dennis Griffin now attends classes with other young witches and wizards, including a girl named Elera who quickly became one of his best friends. Life has never been better. When Elera's younger brother is kidnapped by a monstrous beast and students are forbidden from leaving the school, Dennis is desperate to help her save him.

- A breathtaking journey of magic
- Enjoy 72 challenging match-3 levels
- Follow Dennis’s adventures across 5 chapters
- 20 exciting cinematic scenes
- Reunite with old friends to help defeat a new enemy
